mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.role_name AS "roleName", a.role_flag AS "roleFlag", a.data_scope AS "dataScope", a.status AS "status"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_role a
a.id != '1'
AND a.role_name like concat('%', #{roleName}, '%')
AND a.role_flag = #{roleFlag}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role( role_name, role_flag, data_scope, status ) VALUES ( #{roleName}, #{roleFlag}, #{dataScope}, #{status} )
